existing_features.title: Create a professional, responsive marketing website for a Chartered Accountant based in Sitapur, Uttar Pradesh, with clear sections for: Hero/intro, About, Services, Expertise/Highlights, and Contact.

Write polished English copy throughout the site suitable for a professional Chartered Accountant, including service descriptions for Taxation, GST, Accounting, and Regulatory Compliances, using a formal business tone.
Implement a clear navigation experience (top navbar and footer) that allows users to jump to sections and includes a prominent call-to-action (e.g., “Schedule a Consultation” or “Contact”).
Use a coherent, professional visual theme with consistent typography, spacing, and component styling across the entire site (do not use a blue/purple theme).
Add a Contact section with a simple contact form (name, email/phone, message) that performs client-side validation and shows a success state without requiring external services.

Add basic SEO and social metadata (page title, description, Open Graph fields) reflecting a Chartered Accountant in Sitapur, Uttar Pradesh with expertise in Taxation, GST, Accounting, and Regulatory Compliances.
Render the generated image assets from frontend/public/assets/generated in the site (hero visual, profile placeholder, and service icons).

Replace the current green-based site palette with a light blue theme (no green hues) by updating the global CSS color variables used for `primary`, `accent`, and related tokens so the hero/front page and all components inherit the new light blue styling consistently.

Redesign the front page layout and copy to be simple, formal, and professionally structured (minimal but corporate), improving overall readability and visual hierarchy while keeping the existing site sections (Hero, About, Services, Highlights, Contact) and navigation behavior intact.
Update the existing Services content shown on the front page to include expertise in Bank Audits and Concurrent Audits within the existing Services section (do not create a separate new section).

Update the Contact section to display the phone number "+91 7607105253" and email address "cakamalkishoreagarwal@gmail.com" in the Contact Information area, replacing the existing placeholder text for Phone and Email, and ensure these details appear only within the Contact section (not in the navbar, footer, or any other section).

In the Services section, merge the existing "Bank Audits" and "Concurrent Audits" service cards into a single service entry (one card) with a unified title and description that covers both topics, and remove the separate standalone "Concurrent Audits" entry.

Update the homepage Hero/intro section background so it visually syncs with the site’s light-blue theme and looks more formal/professional by improving the background treatment (e.g., refined overlay/gradient, opacity, and contrast) while keeping the existing hero content, layout structure, and CTA button behavior intact.

Replace the current hero background image with a more professional, subtle, corporate-style background image and wire it into the Hero section as a static asset (served from frontend/public/assets/generated) with an appropriate overlay so it does not overpower the text.
